TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestWrapper extends System.Web.HttpRequestBase

summary.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类，并充当包装类。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 此类公开的功能类并公开类型。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 类，可替换的原始实现使用自定义实现，如执行单元测试在 ASP.NET 管道外部应用程序中的类。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

summary.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是线程安全的。This method is thread-safe. 任何线程可能在任何时候对其进行调用。Any thread may call it at any time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回当前正在执行的页处理程序的文件路径。The property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler. 当您重定向使用的请求方法或方法，属性 （子页） 到返回的页的重定向的路径。When you redirect a request using either the method or the method, the property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等同于只不过它还将读取的字节复制到 ASP.NET 用于填充的内部存储， ，和属性。This method is identical to except that it also copies the bytes that are read to the internal storage that is used by ASP.NET to populate the , , and properties. 由于保留了此信息，如 ASP.NET Web 窗体页面(.aspx 文件)这样的下游代码将成功运行。Because this information is preserved, downstream code such as ASP.NET Web Forms pages (.aspx files) will run successfully. 这不同于使用 方法的情况。This is not the case with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

summary.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用输入的验证标志以确定是否执行验证，通过访问的请求集合， ，和属性。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法设置这些标志这样，当`get`访问器， ，或调用属性，将执行输入的验证。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 验证工作原理是检查所有输入的数据与潜在的危险数据的硬编码列表。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
